question: Question_01_(c)
statement:
\textbf{Short answer questions: Each question carries 6 marks, your
answers should quote the results being used and show your work.}

Find the least positive residue of
$\displaystyle 1! + 2! + 3! + ... + 100!$ modulo 10

\textbf{NOTE} There was a typo in the original problem statement and the
modulo 10 part was missing.
hints:
Notice that $\displaystyle 10 \mid 5!$ and in fact this divides all
values of $\displaystyle m!$ for $\displaystyle m \geq 5$. This reduces
the computation to a small finite set.
